summary:
### Material Information Summary:  

#### **Drilling Results & Resource Update (Silver-Indium Project - Orient West, QLD)**  
- **High-grade intersections** reported across multiple drillholes (ORR091 to ORR095):  
  - **ORR091**: 7m @ 117.4 g/t Ag Eq. (incl. 1m @ 455.8 g/t Ag Eq.), 19m @ 59.7 g/t Ag Eq. (incl. 2m @ 206.9 g/t Ag Eq.).  
  - **ORR092**: 18m @ 67.4 g/t Ag Eq. (incl. 1m @ 380.3 g/t Ag Eq.).  
  - **ORR094**: 9m @ 92.4 g/t Ag Eq. (incl. 1m @ 378.9 g/t Ag Eq.).  
  - **ORR095**: 11m @ 122.4 g/t Ag Eq. (incl. 2m @ 239.0 g/t Ag Eq.).  
- **JORC Resource Estimate**:  
  - Orient West drilling complete; initial **JORC Resource estimate targeted by end-July 2025**.  
  - Orient East drilling complete; JORC Resource expected **September 2025**.  
- **Exploration Target**: 74–100Mt @ 55–65 g/t Ag Eq. (incl. high-grade core of 20–24Mt @ 110–120 g/t Ag Eq.).  
- **Next Steps**: Drilling of geophysical targets planned (late July 2025) to expand resource potential.  

#### **Key Implications**:  
- Confirms **high-grade silver-indium mineralisation continuity**, supporting potential open-pit/underground development.  
- Upcoming JORC Resource estimates may catalyse re-rating (Orient West by July; East by September).  

**No material capital-raising, financial, or operational updates identified.**
